comment:
* Interface exposed by the suspend hal that allows framework to toggle the suspend loop and
 * monitor native wakelocks.
 * @hide

methods.name: public boolean enableAutosuspend(android.os.IBinder token) throws android.os.RemoteException
methods.comment:
* Starts automatic system suspension.
   * 
   * @param token token registering automatic system suspension.
   * When all registered tokens die automatic system suspension is disabled.
   * @return true on success, false otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean forceSuspend() throws android.os.RemoteException
methods.comment: Suspends the system even if there are wakelocks being held.

methods.name: public android.system.suspend.internal.WakeLockInfo[] getWakeLockStats() throws android.os.RemoteException
methods.comment: Returns a list of wake lock stats.

methods.name: public android.system.suspend.internal.WakeupInfo[] getWakeupStats() throws android.os.RemoteException
methods.comment: Returns a list of wakeup stats.

methodNames: public boolean enableAutosuspend(android.os.IBinder token) throws android.os.RemoteException
